thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A decent room for a decent price
thread.title_full: A decent room for a decent price - Review of Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Angie B
title: A decent room for a decent price
text: A small room compared to many other PI rooms I have stayed in, but as I was on my own it didn't matter. I was immediately greeted when I arrived and check-in was quick and easy. This was the only time I met a member of the PI staff during my stay and she was polite and efficient. The double bed was very comfortable, the room was clean. The view was not great, but then it didn't bother me as I arrived in the dark and left early next day! Some road noise of course as it is in the city. A reasonable price for a night's stay in London.
